N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.16 - Accessibility to storage areas; schedule i-v controlled substances

State Regulations
(a) In order to minimize the possibility of internal diversion the licensee shall limit access to the storage areas for controlled substances to a minimum number of employees with a security pass system if the size, type or other factors indicate a need, as determined by the department. (b) Where it is necessary for employee maintenance or nonemployee maintenance personnel, business guests or other visitors to have access to or pass through the controlled substances storage area the licensee shall authorize in writing an employee to provide adequate observation during the time these otherwise unauthorized persons are in the storage area.
